Smart Trash Can: Create a smart trash can that can detect what type of waste is being disposed of and sorts it automatically. This trash can can be connected to a smart home system, allowing users to track their waste production and make more eco-friendly choices.

Interactive Trash Can: Design a trash can that can interact with users through voice commands or facial recognition. Users can ask the trash can questions, play games, or receive reminders to recycle or compost.

Trash Can with Built-In Composter: Create a trash can with a built-in composter that can break down food waste and turn it into nutrient-rich soil. This trash can can be especially useful for households with a garden or indoor plants.
Self-Cleaning Trash Can: Develop a trash can that can clean itself using UV light or other disinfecting technologies. This trash can can help reduce the spread of germs and bacteria in the home.

Trash Can with Air Purifying Technology: Create a trash can with built-in air purifying technology that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air. This trash can can be especially useful for people with respiratory issues or allergies.
